title: Flipped Learning-Based Secondary Mathematics Education Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing secondary mathematics education via flipped learning and simulation/VR tools in limited-technology (smartphone-centric) settings.

learning_goals: Design secondary-level mathematics educational materials based on flipped learning theory
Produce educational content including interactive quizzes and advanced problems according to experiential learning theory
Develop educational simulations/VR scenarios executable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
